32  assert(m_refcount == 0);
33  }
34 
35  // not implemented

37  shm_object &operator=(const shm_object &rhs) = delete;
38 
39 protected:
40  const Type m_type = Undefined;
41  mutable std::atomic<int> m_refcount;
42  allocator m_allocator;
43 
44  int ref() const { assert(m_refcount >= 0); return ++m_refcount; }
45  int unref() const { assert(m_refcount > 0); return --m_refcount; }
46  int refcount() const { assert(m_refcount >= 0); return m_refcount; }
47 };
